DOC.brief_summary: This study represents the first-in-human study for CP-751,871. The study aimed to define the safety, tolerability, and maximum tolerated dose of CP-751,871 in patients with multiple myeloma through a dose escalation design.
DOC.brief_title: CP-751,871 Treatment For Patients With Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: Previously treated multiple myeloma with a quantifiable serum (M spike ≥ 1 g/dL) and/or urine (≥ 200 mg/24hr) paraprotein Adequate bone marrow, renal, liver and cardiac function Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group [ECOG] performance status less than or equal to 2 Prior allogeneic stem cell transplant (alloSCT) Myelosuppressive chemotherapy or immunotherapy within 3 weeks prior to treatment with CP751,871 Prior organ allograft Concurrent use of insulin, oral hypoglycemic medication, growth hormone (GH), or growth hormone inhibitors Female patients who are pregnant or lactating
